description: Information in the KUIP file is stored in XML format, which allows users to modify the contents of the file with a text editor. You can alter the appearance of the user interface and add keyboard shortcuts.
NOTE: The KUIP file is located in the following directory: /​kingsoft/​wps-office/​office[version]/​res

common_filenames.description: wpscommon.kuip - The name of the default KUIP file used to configure the user interface.
